Set up a python venv:
cmd: cd 
cmd: python -m venv .venv
cmd: source .venv/bin/activate


Install requirements which you can find in the subsequent folders (e.g. Gateway....)
- cmd: cd 
- cmd: pip install -r requirements.txt


Start debugger in vscode (left side bar vscode "bug" symbol) and select the configuration you like most.
If not automatically done use the port forward option in vscode (next to terminal: "PORTS") to forward services for debugging.
